name: Humaning
description:
Humaning is a 3 player tabletop role playing game. The players embody bacteria, metal, or plants to create a human life.

✿

20 minutes

✿

3ish players. If you have more people, play on teams or have multiples of each actant. Or get one person to lay on a table to act as the outline of the body and have them ask you the questions. If it's just you, why not try playing as each of the characters and write down the responses as well as the symbols. Do anything.

✿

Tweet pictures of your final human to @karaastone
